thread.title: 14 Ohio counties to receive $3.6M for foster care programs strained by opioid epidemic
thread.title_full: 14 Ohio counties to receive $3.6M for foster care programs strained by opioid epidemic

author: Jackie Borchardt, cleveland.com
title: 14 Ohio counties to receive $3.6M for foster care programs strained by opioid epidemic
text: Ohio Attorney General Mike DeWine announced a $3.6 million pilot program to assist foster care programs burdened by the opioid epidemic in 14 southern Ohio counties.
